message:
One website or another, Fail. It seems to happen a lot.... more than ever. The "Following" link in my twitter account has not responded for at least a week, maybe two. Yesterday something was technically wrong with all twitter requests for a while. Recently, Netflix was off the map for a good part of the afternoon/evening. Today Facebook servers where timing out with no response. Oh, and not long ago, it took a few days for 2% of gmail users to get their mail restored from backup after it vanished one night. Seems no one is immune! Are these scaling problems? Attacks? Quality issues?
Let's hear your downtime experiences! and insight!
the same happened to me with twitter and FB, $#!+
